title: Mohammed bin Salman | Biography, Saudi Arabia, Father, & Mother | Britannica
snippet: 19, 2025, 9:08 PM ET (AP) Show less · Mohammed bin Salman (born August 31, 1985) is the de facto ruler of Saudi Arabia, known for his aggressive foreign policy, ambitious economic vision, and controversial social reforms.

title: Saudi Arabia - United States Department of State
snippet: Saudi Arabia published a new Evidence Law and a new Personal Status Law, both of which have been in force since May 2022. Saudi Arabia also enacted a new Civil Transactions Law, which took effect in December 2022, that fully codified contract law, torts, and provided new rules on damages. As of May 2025, the new criminal code has not yet been approved.

title: Prime Minister of Saudi Arabia - Wikipedia
snippet: The prime minister of Saudi Arabia (Arabic: رئيس مجلس الوزراء, romanized: raʾīs majlis al-wuzraʾ) is the chairman of the Council of Ministers and head of government of the Saudi Arabia. The prime minister is always either the king of Saudi Arabia or crown prince of Saudi Arabia.

title: Mohammed Bin Salman | The Visionary Leader Transforming Saudi Arabia
snippet: In 2025, Mohammed Bin Salman turns 40. Despite his youth, he has already spent a decade steering Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030, balancing tradition with progress while leading the Kingdom through a period of rapid growth.
